title: Ward Skins switched

embed.description: Gyazo lets you instantly grab the screen and upload the image/GIF to the web. You can easily share them on Chat, Twitter, Blog, Tumblr, etc. Available for Windows, Mac and Linux.

body: i own the draven ward skin and only the draven ward skin. whenever i placed down a pink ward it was the soraka ward skin, i used the upgraded trinket to place pink wards. seemed consistant

replies.body: Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're investigating!
